mxGroupCell.title: Group
mxGroupCell.label:
Changing Coin Payout
on Sink Cost Increase
(25%, 50%, 100%)

mxGroupCell.title: Group
mxGroupCell.label:
Various Reward draws in Jackpot
(fixed reward value, add a gate with %age for more randomness control)
30 Min life is the only unique reward. - this acts as infinite life which stays active for 30 min.

mxGroupCell.title: Group
mxGroupCell.label: Powerup drops. You can add more powerup pools & converters & change %age on the gate from powerup pool.

mxGroupCell.title: Group
mxGroupCell.label:
Primary currency payout (like coins).
Stack value changes based on the sink cost, controlled by the state connection coming from fx nodes on top left.
You can control how much (%age of sink cost) stack value is worth by changing the number on (small - b/4, medium - c/2, large - d/1) fx nodes.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Calculating Sink Cost Value -

1. The number of Paid spin counts (a) is multiplied by a multiplier (m) & stored in (a* m).
Eg. - spin number = 1, multiplier = 50. Sink cost for that spin = 50.

2. This is transferred in multiplier fx node for storage.
Where it is also added in fx connected to lastsum.

3. lastsum out connection adds the value to multiplier fx node + the value coming from (a*m).

4. fx node (lastsum) will also transfer the value to the next sink value.
This will be the cost when a player does the next spin.

5. Here we are doing the calculation of the sink cost for doing wheel spin in advance.

6. There are 3 outgoing state connections which change the currency payout relative to the sink cost.
For example, sinking 6000 coins will give the player a chance of getting 6000 (100%), 3000 (50%) & 1500 (25%)

*You can observe similar behavior in Cooking Diary (iOS / Android).

*You can change the multiplier (fx) according to your requirements.

*I found using multiple fx to temporary store values from main calculating fx nodes to be better,
as it doesn't directly manipulate the value on calculating fx nodes.
Easier to identify the formulas + add other variables/patterns especially a pattern like this.

mxGroupCell.title: Group
mxGroupCell.label:
Premium currency payout. You can change the stack value by changing the number on resource connection
before the pool (small / medium stack)
